_comment: Example ACP agent configurations for VibeCodeManager. Copy relevant entries to your config. NOTE: 'type' should be 'stdio' for local processes or 'remote' for HTTP endpoints.

examples._comment: Example stdio agent - spawns a local process
examples.name: research-agent
examples.description: Specialized agent for web research, information gathering, and fact-checking

examples.name: coding-agent
examples.description: Specialized agent for code generation, review, debugging, and refactoring

examples.name: writing-agent
examples.description: Specialized agent for content creation, editing, and document formatting

examples.name: remote-analysis-agent
examples.description: Remote ACP agent for data analysis (hosted externally)

examples.name: beeai-agent
examples.description: Agent running on local BeeAI platform
